name: CMS-HCC Model V24
title: CMS Hiearchical Category Condition (CMS-HCC) Risk Adjustment Model Version 24
publisher: HL7 International - Clinical Quality Information Work Group
description: *Example Measure resource to demonstrate the framework for Cervical Cancer Screening*: Percentage of women 21-64 years of age who were screened for cervical cancer using either of the following criteria: *  Women age 21-64 who had cervical cytology performed every 3 years.*  Women age 30-64 who had cervical cytology/human papillomavirus (HPV) co-testing performed every 5 years
